tool_description: Some nice burgers to eat in Auckland and Tokyo
name: Burger Rec API
title: Burger Rec API

api_list.name: Get list of burgers
api_list.description: Get burger list detailing the ingredients, store name and address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://burger-rec-api.p.rapidapi.com/burgers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "burger-rec-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://burger-rec-api.p.rapidapi.com/burgers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "burger-rec-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
